me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit.datastore

Class SerializableLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit.datastore.SerializableLocation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationSerializable

    public final class SerializableLocation
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigurationSerializable
    Represents a YAML-serializable location class.
    Author:
    Glen Husman

    • Method Detail

      • getWorld

        public World getWorld()
        Gets the World instance corresponding to the world name in the serialized form of this location.
        Returns:
        The World instance that this location belongs in, or null if it is invalid.

      • getLocation

        public Location getLocation()
        Gets the deserialized location.
        Returns:
        A new Location instance representing this serialized state, or null if the serialized form was invalid.
